=== About Kaung Htet Htun ===
Mingalar Par, I am Kaung Htet Htun. I am just now at Yangon, Myanmar.

I am Team Leader of <nowiki>[[https://www.facebook.com/BarCampTUMeiktila|BarCamp TU-Meiktila 2014~2015]]</nowiki> and Founder of Phoewa Science and also Member of <nowiki>[[http://ubuntu-mm.net/|Ubuntu Myanmar LoCo Team]]</nowiki>.

=== Why using Ubuntu? ===

In 2013, <nowiki>[[http://facebook.com/kokoye2007|Ko Ko Ye`]]</nowiki> & LoCo Team introduced me Ubuntu and <nowiki>[[http://raspberrypi.org|Raspberry Pi]]</nowiki> at Mandalay. I love Ubuntu{{https://wiki.ubuntu.com/moin_static192/light/img/icon_cof.png}} because Ubuntu is Free, open source, user friendly, regular release, community help and no virus problems.

=== Life Goals ===

My main goal as a freelance programmer. Now, I'm studying C, C++, Python, Matlab and also insterested in electronics and micro controllers, so preceiving about <nowiki>[[https://www.arduino.cc/|Arduino]]</nowiki> open hardware.
